text: --.If C00, insert record and carry out steps-1-2-and 3 --Final Check IF(QchangeOwnership = 1) BEGIN INSERT INTO [blul.[tbl_enroll_request] (RequestTypeID,UdcAcntNum, EspAcntNum, CustomerName,ServiceAddress, ServiceAddress2, ServiceCity,ServiceStateID,ServiceZip, ServiceAddressID, SalesAgentID, ContractEffectiveDt,ParticipatingInterest, LdcRateCodeID,StateSalesTaxExempt,BillingTypelID,EspBillRate,ProductType,EnrollmentStatusID, DateToSubmit,SubmitRecord,0ffCycleDate, HistoricalUsageTypeID, UdcID,client_int_id, CreatedUserID, CreatedDateTime, AccountTypeID, PreRequestID, AggregatorID, TaxRate, CustomerCharge, ValidationName, OrganizationID, SubsidiaryID) VALUES(QRequestTypeID,@UdcAcntNum,dEspAcntNum, aCustomerName, CASE @AddressTypeID WHEN 0 THEN @ServiceAddress ELSE NULL END, CASE @AddressTypeID WHEN 0 THEN @ServiceAddress2 ELSE NULL END, CASE @AddressTypeID WHEN 0 THEN @ServiceCity ELSE NULL END, @ServiceStateID, --case @AddressTypeID when @ then @ServiceStateID else null end, CASE @AddressTypeID WHEN 0 THEN @ServiceZip ELSE NULL END, CASE @AddressTypeID WHEN 1 THEN @ServiceAddressID ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN @SalesAgentID < 1 THEN null else @SalesAgentID END, CASE ISDATE(@ContractEffectiveDt) WHEN 1 THEN CONVERT(smalldatetime,@ContractEffectiveDt) ELSE NULL END, CASE ISNUMERIC(@ParticipatingInterest) WHEN 1 THEN CONVERT(numeric(5,2), @ParticipatingInterest) ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN @lLdcRateCodeID < 1 THEN null ELSE @lLdcRateCodeID END, CASE ISNUMERIC(@StateSalesTaxExempt) WHEN 1 THEN CONVERT(numeric(5,2), @StateSalesTaxExempt) ELSE NULL END, @BillingTypelD, CASE TSNUMERIC(@EspBillRate) WHEN 1 THEN CONVERT(numeric(12,5), @EspBillRate) ELSE NULL END, @ProductType, --case @SendCCHTaxRequest when 1 then 22 else 1 end, CASE WHEN @SendCCHTaxRequest=1 and @SubmitRecord = 1 THEN 23
